articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Dragon's Dogma 2 update plans include 30fps cap, new game option - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Capcom has laid out its plans for future Dragon's Dogma 2 updates.
articles.content:
Capcom has laid out its plans for future Dragon's Dogma 2 updates.
The developer will be adding new features such as the option to start a new game when save data already exists and changing up the … [+2246 chars]

articles.title: 'The headset helps my depression so I can be a dad again' - BBC.com
articles.description: Ashley Riley says he can be a full-time father again after using an electric headset to treat depression.
